Hello there!

We’re hostworld.uk, and we’re a UK based web hosting provider. Let’s cut to the chase, here are some key things you need to know about us before you buy our plans and join us on your VPS hosting journey:

  • 24/7 expert support and lightning fast ticket responses - we respond to all support tickets within 20 minutes on average!
  • We own and operate our own VPS infrastructure and have heavily invested in enterprise-grade hardware and our super-fast network to ensure we have one of the best VPS platforms available. Because we are in full control of our platform start-to-finish, we can provide a fully featured and high level of service at a low cost point.
  • Tailor your SSD VPS to suit your needs. Add some extra storage, maybe a little more RAM too, and go all out and increase the number of CPU cores. It’s up to you.
  • We only use state of the art SSD drives in all of our servers - no moving parts means a faster service for you!
  • UK servers - we currently provide our services from UK data centres which provides super-fast connectivity, even if you don’t live here!
  • We really do care about your hosting experience - talk to us, send us an email, pick up the phone, we’re real people striving to provide every single one of our customers with a consistent and reliable hosting experience, no matter how much is spent on hosting with us.
  • We’re reliable! We provide a 99.9% uptime guarantee because making sure your website is available is essential. You can see our uptime here https://status.hostworld.uk/.

If you need to know anything else about us send an email to sales@hostworld.uk and we’ll be back in touch!

Uptime Guarantee

We are so confident we can offer 99.9% uptime or more that we have an uptime guarantee in place. Every package with us gets our 99.9% uptime guarantee - or your money back. For more information about our uptime guarantee click here.

You can also see our sever status in real time, and the true uptime of our servers. Check it our yourself here http://status.hostworld.uk.

So, what plans do we offer?

We have two VPS packages that are not shown on our website available and are exclusive offers for Low End Talk.

Our UK nodes are provisioned with SSD storage and our US nodes are provisioned with NVMe storage. We’re looking to bring NVMe storage to the UK as soon as we can (very soon!).

US Launch Special 1 - 768MB RAM, 1x CPU, 15GB SSD Space, FREE 45GB Backup Storage - £2.49 ($3.03) per month
Order US (NMVe)

Irrespective of which one you choose all VPS’s come with:

  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps Uplink

We have other plans and more information available via our website http://hostworld.uk/ssd-vps.

Test Our Network

Looking Glass: http://lg.hostworld.uk
Looking Glass (US): http://lgus.hostworld.uk

What else is included?

We don’t just provide basic VPS plans here at hostworld, we provide you with robust, feature rich virtual private servers as well as:

  • Instant Activation - place an order with us and have the server up and running within minutes.
  • Choice of Operating Systems - select from CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora and Webuzo.
  • Custom ISO - upload your own ISO.
  • Pre-install a Control Panel - have one of the leading control panels installed automatically upon ordering your VPS. Select from cPanel, Plesk, Webmin, Interworx, ISPConfig or CentOS Web Panel (subject to OS compatibility).
  • Automatic Backups - we provide a weekly backup of your VPS server as standard, and retain 3 of these backups at all times. You can even upgrade this to daily backups for just 15% of your base plan cost.
  • 24/7 Expert Support - we’re here when you need us every day of the year, every step of the way. We’ll always try and help you out of a sticky situation.
  • Powered by KVM - all our servers utilise the latest available KVM virtualisation technology.
  • Industry leading Control Panel - we provide a self-service control panel within our portal, putting you in full control of your VPS.
  • Tailor your SSD VPS - customise your VPS package to suit your needs. Add some extra storage, maybe a little more RAM too and go all out and increase the number of CPU cores. It’s totally up to you.
  • Upgrade & Downgrade at any time - we like to keep things simple; so you can regrade your VPS package at any time.
  • No Contracts - we don’t believe in contracting you into a service and are confident that our VPS hosting service speaks for itself. We provide a no contracts service with no setup fees, giving you peace of mind and flexibility.
